mn36:10.5: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ → netaṃ kho ṭhānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn36:11.1: Na hi nūna → naha nūna (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn36:14.12: attano → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mn36:22.4: muddhani → muddhāni (bj); muddhānaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ūhananti → ūhanti (si); ohananti (sya-all, km); uhananti (mr)
mn36:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṃ abhimantheyya (si, pts-vp-pli1ed); muddhānaṃ abhimattheyya (sya-all, km)
mn36:26.6: vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj) | arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti
mn36:27.7: ajjhohāreyyuṃ → ajjhohareyyuṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | ajajjitaṃ → ajaddhukaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); jaddhukaṃ (sya-all, km)
